Photographs of Kamlesh Mandriya with hea: claiming that he was attacked by the Left at JNU.
Pranav Sawhney: a Delhi resident, posted pictures of billboards displaying images of injured students with the hashtag #LeftAttackstudents, further supporting the claim.
hameenasto: an Instagram user who took the images, confirmed that the billboards were installed near Delhi School of Economics and were accompanied by smaller posters in and around North Campus.
Several Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parish: ABVP) accounts on Twitter circulated the same photographs and blamed student bodies aligned with the Left for the attack, using the #LeftAttacksJNU hashtag.
